Text: Doesn't work on a Galaxy SII - installs fine following the instructions, and the game launches and works in menus etc, but the textures are all messed up. Just some sort of red hue in the middle of the screen while you can hear the sound. Have tested with and without Chainfire's 3D textures.
I got a parse error when i tried to install the game on my LG Optimus M. Even though this one didn't work, your other downloads are great Thug
